headline: Nuclear Stock Oklo Hits Major Milestone. Is It Enough to Buy?
summary: Oklo (NYSE:OKLO) has drawn investor attention as a leading player in advanced nuclear technology. The company focuses on small modular reactors (SMRs), which promise compact, scalable power solutions. Investors are betting big on Oklo’s potential to capitalize on the artificial intelligence (AI) boom, where data centers consume massive energy. AI’s growth demands reliable, high-capacity sources, ... Nuclear Stock Oklo Hits Major Milestone. Is It Enough to Buy?

headline: Nasdaq Could Mark Biggest Comeback Since April. Wall Street Is Buying the Dip in Nvidia and Other AI Stocks.
summary: The Nasdaq Composite clawed back to positive territory as a handful of key AI stocks like Nvidia rallied off their lows.  The S&P 500 was down 0.2%, though only 147 stocks in the index were in positive territory.  Nvidia turned positive and was up 0.5% in recent trading.

headline: Constellation Energy (CEG): Assessing Valuation After Recent Pullback and Sector Trends
summary: Constellation Energy (CEG) shares recently reflected a slight dip, moving in line with broader sector trends. Some investors are watching to see if the company's solid revenue and income growth can shift momentum in the coming months. See our latest analysis for Constellation Energy. After delivering a strong total shareholder return of 49.9% over the past year and an impressive 281.7% across three years, Constellation Energy’s recent 1-month share price pullback reflects a cooling period...
